forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds with a whisper of spritz, as a slight chance of drizzle lingers before the sun fully takes its stage. The sky, a canvas of blue sprinkled with hints of clouds, is set against the city’s familiar silhouette. Highs will dance around 64 before easing into a more temperate 62, as the gentle west-southwest wind carries with it the promise of a warm afternoon, disrupted only by the occasional gust. For now, the air is crisp and invigorating, with the chance of a little sprinkle hovering around 20%. 

As the day transitions into evening, clouds will weave themselves into a more prominent tapestry, overshadowing the city’s cheerful expanse and hinting at the unassuming drizzles expected after 2am. Whether one takes a contemplative stroll along the waterfront or simply enjoys the quietude of a café, today’s conditions invite soft layers—perhaps a light sweater or a well-loved jacket—to cradle against the subtle chill. The city feels both alive and tranquil, a canvas where one can find solace in everyday moments, be it savoring an artisan pastry or meandering through a sun-dappled park.
